## {.tabset .tabset-pills}

### Yesterday


```{r, echo = FALSE}
p1 = tideData %>%
    filter(date == as.Date(Sys.time(), tz = "EST5EDT")-1)

getPlot(p1, tideData)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
hr()
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
date = as.Date(Sys.time(), tz = "EST5EDT")-1
getTextSummary(dailyWeather = dailyWeather, date = date)
```
